channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Something
item.description: Let $X=\coprod_{i\in I}X_i$ be a basis. $\mathcal{T}(X)$ is the topology generated by $X$. We call it the disjoint union topology.

item.title: Hello
item.description: How to create a new post So, on your computer, cd to the folder in terminal. Then type hugo new posts/<name>.md to create a new post. Edit it as you wish. Finally, in your terminal, git add . , git commit -m "<text>", and git push.

Sam’s first 413 lecture Gomor’s Theorem: If you move two cells of a $8 \times 8$ chessboard of opposite colors, the remaining cells can be fully domino tiled. Pf: Draw a closed path that passes through every square exactly once. (Draw a big C and then draw back and forth horizontally) Choose the two cells to be removed, and the closed path we have will be sperated into two paths.
